title: Strengthening Mathematics Knowledge Sharing Competencies Through MOOCs-Based Community of Practice Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Experience with Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: A blended course combining real-time workshops and asynchronous MOOCs to enhance math-based decision-making skills for corporate managers/leaders. Learners freely access content via personal devices and engage in community of practice activities with peers.

learning_goals: Analyze at least three case studies of mathematical problem-solving on MOOCs platforms and present findings in a real-time workshop
Develop two improvement proposals for mathematical modeling based on peer feedback within a community of practice
Utilize a math content creation tool for knowledge sharing to develop one instructional method resource
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
